processed_by.processor: Cui, Hong using Text2XML java application init commit r86, validated against beeSchema.xsd revision f0a80a8516a06e51224d01314403eb26d60f881d

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section flagellares;species imperiorum;

treatment.description: In habit, stout canes, prickles and pubescence like no. 52; broad primocane-leaflets coarsely dentate, the dentations 3-5 mm. long and broad, the terminal petiolule 3-3.5 cm. long; floricane-leaflets lobulate-dentate, the low rounded teeth 3-7 mm. long and 4-6 mm. broad, the terminal leaflet and simple bracts broadly rhombic; leafy corymb 2-8-flowered; petals 1.2 cm. long, 8 mm. broad; fruit 1.2 cm. in diameter.
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: Grassy borders of pine-woods, se. Va. Fl. April, early May; fr. June.
